Hello,Instacash funding is FREE if you decide on standard ACH delivery, which takes only 24-48 hours. If you need your Instacash extra fast, you can decide on instant Turbo funding, please visit our website [__https://www.moneylion.com/instacash/__](https://www.moneylion.com/instacash/) to view the turbo fees associated with the amounts and funding method you select. It can take up to four hours to receive. The Turbo fee is totally optional and just helps us cover the cost of delivering your cash advance instantly when youâ€™re in a pinch. We created Instacash to help you access extra money to cover everyday essentials and unexpected expenses, and we designed it easy to repay. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash advances in increments of $100 or less. Of course, if youâ€™ve unlocked an Instacash limit higher than $100, it will all still be available to you if you need it. Youâ€™ll just have to take it out in an advance of up to $100 at a time. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

The amount of Instacash you are eligible to receive is based on a variety of factors, including your MoneyLion account history, deposit and spending activity, repayment history, and other risk\-based factors, as determined by MoneyLion in its sole discretion, and may change from time to time. Therefore, demonstrating consistent direct deposits and on\-time payments can increase your Instacash eligibility, while a negative change in these factors could lower your Instacash eligibility. One of the best ways to ensure higher amounts of Instacash is connecting your direct deposits to a RoarMoney account. The same direct deposit when detected in RoarMoney \(vs. an external bank account\) will unlock TWICE the Instacash.

We created Instacash to help you access extra money to cover everyday essentials and unexpected expenses, and we designed it easy to repay. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash advances in increments of $100 or less. Of course, if youâ€™ve unlocked an Instacash limit higher than $100, it will all still be available to you if you need it. Youâ€™ll just have to take it out in an advance of up to $100 at a time. Tipping is optional, and whether or not you choose to tip doesnâ€™t affect your eligibility in any way. Just be sure to read the screens and make your selections carefully, and you can use Instacash without tips or fees if you decide. That said, if you decide to leave a tip, thank you! It helps us cover the costs of providing 0% APR cash Instacash advances to many, many folks like you! The amount of Instacash you are eligible to receive is based on a variety of factors, including your MoneyLion account history, deposit and spending activity, repayment history, and other risk\-based factors, as determined by MoneyLion in its sole discretion, and may change from time to time. Therefore, demonstrating consistent direct deposits and on\-time payments can increase your Instacash eligibility, while a negative change in these factors could lower your Instacash eligibility.One of the best ways to ensure higher amounts of Instacash is connecting your direct deposits to a RoarMoney account. The same direct deposit when detected in RoarMoney \(vs. an external bank account\) will unlock TWICE the Instacash. You will always be informed of your current available Instacash amount in the MoneyLion mobile app. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please contact us.We will also reach out to you to address any further concerns!

The amount of Instacash you are eligible to receive is based on a variety of factors, including your MoneyLion account history, deposit and spending activity, repayment history, and other risk\-based factors, as determined by MoneyLion in its sole discretion, and may change from time to time. Therefore, demonstrating consistent direct deposits and on\-time payments can increase your Instacash eligibility, while a negative change in these factors could lower your Instacash eligibility.One of the best ways to ensure higher amounts of Instacash is connecting your direct deposits to a RoarMoney account. The same direct deposit when detected in RoarMoney \(vs. an external bank account\) will unlock TWICE the Instacash. You will always be informed of your current available Instacash amount in the MoneyLion mobile app. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please contact us.

We created Instacash to help you access extra money to cover everyday essentials and unexpected expenses, and we designed it easy to repay. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash advances in increments of $50 or less. Of course, if youâ€™ve unlocked an Instacash limit higher than $50, it will all still be available to you if you need it. Youâ€™ll just have to take it out in an advance of $50 at a time. Tipping is optional, and whether you choose to tip doesnâ€™t affect your eligibility in any way. Pay what you think is fair, or don't pay at all, it's up to you. Just be sure to read the screens and make your selections carefully, and you can use Instacash without tips or fees if you choose. That said, if you choose to leave a tip â€” thank you! It helps us cover the costs of providing 0% APR cash Instacash advances to many, many folks like you!Instacash funding is FREE if you choose standard delivery, which takes only 24-48 hours. If you need your Instacash extra fast, you can choose instant Turbo funding for $4.99 (or $3.99 if you have our RoarMoney bank account). The Turbo fee is totally optional and just helps us cover the cost of delivering your cash advance instantly when youâ€™re in a pinch. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

The amount of Instacash you are eligible to receive is based on a variety of factors, including your MoneyLion account history, deposit and spending activity, repayment history, and other risk-based factors, as determined by MoneyLion in its sole discretion, and may change from time to time. Therefore, demonstrating consistent direct deposits and on-time payments can increase your Instacash eligibility, while a negative change in these factors could lower your Instacash eligibility. Tipping is optional, and whether you choose to tip doesnâ€™t affect your eligibility in any way. Pay what you think is fair, or don't pay at all, it's up to you. Just be sure to read the screens and make your selections carefully, and you can use Instacash without tips or fees if you choose. That said, if you choose to leave a tip â€” thank you! It helps us cover the costs of providing 0% APR cash Instacash advances to many, many folks like you!Instacash funding is FREE if you choose standard delivery, which takes only 24-48 hours. If you need your Instacash extra fast, you can choose instant Turbo funding for $4.99 (or $3.99 if you have our RoarMoney bank account). The Turbo fee is totally optional and just helps us cover the cost of delivering your cash advance instantly when youâ€™re in a pinch. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

The amount of Instacash you are eligible to receive is based on a variety of factors, including your MoneyLion account history, deposit and spending activity, repayment history, and other risk-based factors, as determined by MoneyLion in its sole discretion, and may change from time to time. Therefore, demonstrating consistent direct deposits and on-time payments can increase your Instacash eligibility, while a negative change in these factors could lower your Instacash eligibility. One of the best ways to ensure higher amounts of Instacash is connecting your direct deposits to a RoarMoney account. The same direct deposit when detected in RoarMoney (vs. an external bank account) will unlock TWICE the Instacash. You will always be informed of your current available Instacash amount in the MoneyLion mobile app. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please contact us.

We created Instacash to help you access extra money to cover everyday essentials and unexpected expenses, and we designed it easy to repay. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash advances in increments of $50 or less. Of course, if youâ€™ve unlocked an Instacash limit higher than $50, it will all still be available to you if you need it. Youâ€™ll just have to take it out in advances of $50 at a time. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly. Tipping is optional, and whether you choose to tip doesnâ€™t affect your eligibility in any way. Pay what you think is fair, or don't pay at all, it's up to you. Just be sure to read the screens and make your selections carefully, and you can use Instacash without tips or fees if you choose. That said, if you choose to leave a tip â€” thank you! It helps us cover the costs of providing 0% APR cash Instacash advances to many, many folks like you!Instacash funding is FREE if you choose standard delivery, which takes only 24-48 hours. If you need your Instacash extra fast, you can choose instant Turbo funding for $4.99 (or $3.99 if you have our RoarMoney bank account). The Turbo fee is totally optional and just helps us cover the cost of delivering your cash advance instantly when youâ€™re in a pinch. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

The amount of Instacash you are eligible to receive is based on a variety of factors, including your MoneyLion account history, deposit and spending activity, repayment history, and other risk-based factors, as determined by MoneyLion in its sole discretion, and may change from time to time. Therefore, demonstrating consistent direct deposits and on-time payments can increase your Instacash eligibility, while a negative change in these factors could lower your Instacash eligibility. One of the best ways to ensure higher amounts of Instacash is connecting your direct deposits to a RoarMoney account. The same direct deposit when detected in RoarMoney (vs. an external bank account) will unlock TWICE the Instacash. You will always be informed of your current available Instacash amount in the MoneyLion mobile app. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please contact us.

Hi Jodi, The amount of Instacash you are eligible to receive is based on a variety of factors, including your MoneyLion account history, deposit and spending activity, repayment history, and other risk-based factors, as determined by MoneyLion in its sole discretion, and may change from time to time. Therefore, demonstrating consistent direct deposits and on-time payments can increase your Instacash eligibility, while a negative change in these factors could lower your Instacash eligibility. One of the best ways to ensure higher amounts of Instacash is connecting your direct deposits to a RoarMoney account. The same direct deposit when detected in RoarMoney (vs. an external bank account) will unlock TWICE the Instacash. You will always be informed of your current available Instacash amount in the MoneyLion mobile app. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please contact us.

Hi Tonya,We created Instacash to help you access extra money to cover everyday essentials and unexpected expenses, and we designed it easy to repay. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash advances in increments of $50 or less. Of course, if youâ€™ve unlocked an Instacash limit higher than $50, it will all still be available to you if you need it. Youâ€™ll just have to take it out in advances of $50 at a time. Instacash funding is FREE if you choose standard delivery, which takes only 24-48 hours. If you need your Instacash extra fast, you can choose instant Turbo funding for $4.99 (or $3.99 if you have our RoarMoney bank account). The Turbo fee is totally optional and just helps us cover the cost of delivering your cash advance instantly when youâ€™re in a pinch. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

Hi Beatrice, Instacash offers you 0% APR cash advances up to $250 whenever you need some extra cash to cover your essentials or an unexpected expense. Thereâ€™s no interest, no monthly fee, and no credit check. We created Instacash to help you access extra money to cover everyday essentials and unexpected expenses, and we designed it easy to repay. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash advances in increments of $50 or less. Of course, if youâ€™ve unlocked an Instacash limit higher than $50, it will all still be available to you if you need it. Youâ€™ll just have to take it out in advances of $50 at a time. Instacash funding is FREE if you choose standard delivery, which takes only 24-48 hours. If you need your Instacash extra fast, you can choose instant Turbo funding for $4.99 (or $3.99 if you have our RoarMoney bank account). The Turbo fee is totally optional and just helps us cover the cost of delivering your cash advance instantly when youâ€™re in a pinch. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

The amount of Instacash you are eligible to receive is based on a variety of factors, including your MoneyLion account history, deposit and spending activity, repayment history, and other risk-based factors, as determined by MoneyLion in its sole discretion, and may change from time to time. Therefore, demonstrating consistent direct deposits and on-time payments can increase your Instacash eligibility, while a negative change in these factors could lower your Instacash eligibility. One of the best ways to ensure higher amounts of Instacash is connecting your direct deposits to a RoarMoney account. The same direct deposit when detected in RoarMoney (vs. an external bank account) will unlock TWICE the Instacash. You will always be informed of your current available Instacash amount in the MoneyLion mobile app. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please contact us.

Hi Jessica,MoneyLion does place a hold on accounts for some transactions. The hold amount is 20% for transactions at restaurants, bars, hotels and car rentals. This is to account for gratuity, and incidentals at these locations, and should disappear within a few business days after the transaction settles. Sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused. We are always looking forways to better our service, and your feedback is an invaluable part of that process.

Hello,Instacash funding is FREE if you choose standard delivery, which takes only 24-48 hours. If you need your Instacash extra fast, you can choose instant Turbo funding for $4.99 (or $3.99 if you have our RoarMoney bank account). The Turbo fee is totally optional and just helps us cover the cost of delivering your cash advance instantly when youâ€™re in a pinch. Tipping is optional, and whether you choose to tip doesnâ€™t affect your eligibility in any way. Pay what you think is fair, or don't pay at all, it's up to you. Just be sure to read the screens and make your selections carefully, and you can use Instacash without tips or fees if you choose. That said, if you choose to leave a tip â€” thank you! It helps us cover the costs of providing 0% APR cash Instacash advances to many, many folks like you! We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.
